title: Corki rocket ship bug
body:
my friend was playing in an ARAM game with a Corki and he found a upside down rocket with 5 blinding dots on it. on his screen it was displayed but on my screen it was not displayed (we where playing together). i have seen this in the past and was playing with a Corki that game, Corki also has a rocket ship, that leads me do please this happened because a Corki was in the game.

this is what the rocket ship looked like(i am not sure if the pictures will register but its worth a shot

replies.body:
Hey Eugene117,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look into this.

replies.poster: d I I b d I I b
replies.body: i have also seen this bug today.
